sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Delete presence management scheduled job</description> <name>Delete presence management job</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_trigger"); gr.addQuery("trigger_class", "com.snc.awa.presence.job.PresenceMgtJob"); gr.deleteMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-03-16 23:04:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>55bdea56b76300100d13ef54ce11a96c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete presence management job</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">7f858779db01111086a072c7f496190d</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_55bdea56b76300100d13ef54ce11a96c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-03-16 23:04:44</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
